name: Stickman Rope Jumper Hero
description:
Someone has told stickman that he can't beat joker in entertaining people. Now Stickman has to prove his talent and skills in circus and pass the highest score.
Stickman is in circus and wants to show some acrobatics skills but electrifying dooms are making it difficult for him to cross.Avoid the electric dooms in order to earn your way to stardom. It will going to be more and more difficult so you have to be focused at every level.
The good news is you have to collect more and more candies in order to unlock the other themes, costumes and other amazing features and rewards. Collect as many candies as you can and go as far as you can to score your high score and prove your critics wrong.
Stickman is all ready now to rock the circus and be the star

Features:

Engaging game play
Amazing 2D environment
Unlock other themes and features by collecting candies
Become a Star of a night
Set the highest score
Endless levels
